articles.author: Chloe Taylor
articles.title: European markets fall in last full trading day of 2024 - CNBC
articles.description: European markets traded in negative territory on Monday, in what will be the region's final full trading session of the year.
articles.content:
European markets traded in negative territory on Monday, in what will be the region's final full trading session of the year.
The pan-European Stoxx 600 index was around 0.2% lower at 11:32 a.m. Lon… [+3159 chars]
